title: TechSmith SnagIt v9.1.2 (Build 304) + Serial
description:
TechSmith SnagIt v9.1.2
------------------------

Introduction:
--------------
Capture anything you see on the screen. Edit and combine those captures. Share them via your favorite applications. Organize and find them again later. The more you use SnagIt, the more ways you'll find to use it! 

What's new?
------------
- Mini Toolbar:
Eliminate extra clicks and keep the most frequently used editing features at your fingertips.

- Live Preview:
Try on different editing options by scrolling over your capture and seeing what a torn edge or shadow would look like...before you commit to the change.

- Fluid workflow:
Carefree capturing is here. Say goodbye to capture, edit, share and hello to your style. Go ahead... capture, capture, capture... capture, edit, capture, edit.

- Sleek editing interface:
The Editor's new menus make it quicker to get at the features you use most... and easier to discover the ones you've never used.

- Auto-store:
Snagit now stores every screen capture automatically so there is no pressure to name the capture or decide where to save it.

- Auto-store export:
Changing computers? Not to worry, you can take all your unsaved captures with you.

- Open captures tray:
The open captures tray displays all your captures so you can easily find old ones and drag-and-drop to combine them.

- Visual search pane:
Snagit's Visual Search PaneRemember the website or application you captured from? Now you can search based on where you captured, not just file names and dates.

- Tags & flags:
Tags and Flags in Snagit 9.1Capture online receipts and tag with the "financial" flag. Or remind yourself of something with the "follow up" flag.

- Stamps:
Categories and visual search make your favorite stamps easier than ever to find. Explore the accessories section for stamps and other ways you can customize Snagit.

Installation instructions:
---------------------------
1. Run the installer, snagit.exe
2. Install using the serial from Serial.txt
3. Enjoy!
Serial by Team Z.W.T.
